Education

The University of Chicago Chicago, Illinois

B.A. in Economics Class of 2018

My coursework at the college has focused primarily on mobile computing and applications of machine learning models. Outside of class I was a member of the Trott Business Program and an executive member of the Order of the C, a student-athlete organization that acted as an intermediary between the athletes and administration. I was a Stagg Medal awardee and the captain of the Varsity Men's Tennis Team.

Professional

Ventas, Inc. Chicago, Illinois

Research

SAND Lab Chicago, Illinois

Research Assistant March 2018 - Present

Currently I am researching super resolution techniques for iris authentication. Past research topics include adversarial localization through passive WiFi sensing and predicting application usage through CPU data.
